pullRequest.body:
We add `Solution'` and `Solution`, structures representing solutions to the generalized Fermat's equation `FermatLastTheoremForThreeGen`.  The proof of flt3 will be a descent argument on a given `Solution`.

---

nodes.body: :v: riccardobrasca can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

> This all looks fine to me. Why are we formalising this proof rather than the one over integers in FLT-regular, by the way?
> 
> bors d+

No particular reasons, it seemed a good excuse to develop the relevant API and test the current one.

nodes.body:
This all looks fine to me. Why are we formalising this proof rather than the one over integers in FLT-regular, by the way?

bors d+
